author: gstein
msg: Improve the performance of the ap_r* functions by buffering their data in
Further information/discussion of this patch is available on new-httpd

author: fanf
msg: Relax the checking of Host: headers so that only character sequences that
are sensitive to the filesystem are rejected, i.e. forward slashes,
backward slashes, and sequences of more than one dot. This supports iDNS
without compromising the safety of mass vhosting.

author: slive
msg: Fix the search form to interface to the new search engine.

author: rbb
msg: Allow the core_output_filter to deal with multiple file buckets in the

author: rbb
msg: Fix the core_output_filter.  It doesn't make any sense to send less than
8K of a file using sendfile, it is easier to just read strings from the
file and use those strings directly.
